name: NCAA Football 2001
overview: NCAA Football 2001 captures the hard hitting, smash-nose football action gamers have come to expect from the NCAA Football franchise. The game also features exclusive licenses for the FedEx? Orange Bowl, Tostitos Fiesta Bowl and Nokia Sugar Bowl and is the only game that allows players to compete for the National Championship in the Orange Bowl. NCAA Football 2001 is scheduled for release in time for the kickoff of college football season.
